bibl.title: Notes on John C. Hemmeter's article on Carroll, by Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]

div1.p: Autograph notes by Hench identifying the errors in Hemmeter's journal article entitled "Major James Carroll," published in Janus 13: 57-72 and 150-176; 1908.

div1.head: Notes on John C. Hemmeter's article on Carroll, by Philip Showalter Hench, [19--]
